entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 02:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
